0 D'Ago Hunter

Position Running Back

Hometown Culpeper, Va.

Highschool Eastern View

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2022 STATS Perform All-American Third Team punt returner

2022 CAA Special Teams Player of the Year

2023 All-CAA Third Team kick returner

2022 All-CAA First Team kick returner

2022 All-CAA Second Team punt returner

2021 All-CAA Third Team punt returner

2023: Finished his Towson career with 4,067 all-purpose yards and ranks second in Towson history with 2,491 career kickoff return yards... Towson's primary running back and special teams returner in first six games before getting injured, earning All-CAA Third Team kick returner... had 959 all-purpose yards, rushing 59 times for 308 yards, making 22 catches for 137 yards, returning 20 kickoffs for 485 yards and four punts for 29 yards... tallied up 324 all-purpose yards in overtime victory at New Hampshire (9/30), rushing 17 times for 116 yards, making seven catches for 71 yards and returning seven kickoffs 137 yards.

2022: First Tiger to be an All-American since 2018, being a STATS Perform All-American Third Team at punt returner... CAA Special Teams Player of the Year after being All-CAA First Team at kick returner and All-CAA Second Team at punt returner... amassed 1,207 all-purpose yards, including 639 kickoff yards, 195 punt return yards, 262 rushing yards and 111 receiving yards... three-time CAA Special Teams Player of the Week plus was the Fedex Ground FCS National Special Teams Player of the Week after having 334 all-purpose yards, including a 92-yard touchdown return on a kickoff and a 74-yard punt return, in win at Monmouth (10/29)... returned kickoff for 96 yards for a touchdown at FBS foe West Virginia (9/17)... tied a Towson single season record with two kickoff returns for touchdown, first Tiger to accomplish that feat since 2013... returned a punt 77 yards for a touchdown in win vs. Villanova (11/5)... third in FCS in yards per punt return (16.2) and fourth in FCS in combined kick return yardage (834).

2021: Towson's all-purpose yards leader with 1,104, earning All-CAA Third Team at punt returner... amassed 753 kickoff yards, 121 punt return yards, 122 rushing yards and 108 receiving yards... notched a 32-yard punt return, Towson's longest of the year, in the Battle For Greater Baltimore road victory over Morgan State (9/4)... season-high 158 all-purpose yards, including 126 yards on kickoff returns, at William & Mary (10/23)... notched a 43-yard touchdown rush in home victory vs. UAlbany (10/30).

2019: Towson's primary kick and punt returner, playing in all 12 games... Racked up 797 all-purpose yards, with 684 coming on special teams returns... Tallied up 614 kickoff return yards, earning a 92-yard return touchdown vs. Bucknell (10/19), ranking fifth in the CAA with 26.7 yards per return, and 70 punt return yards... Also served as a wide receiver and running back, having eight catches for 82 yards and five rushes for 31 yards... Finished Bucknell game with 183 all-purpose yards, including the 92-yard kickoff return and 25-yard punt return... Compiled 135 kickoff return yards on five returns at James Madison (10/26).

2018: Member of the special teams unit, playing in the first three games of the year, redshirt season granted.

HIGH SCHOOL: Played football, basketball and track at Eastern View...Two-time All-State and All-Class B honors as a kick returner.

PERSONAL: Major is business administration.
